CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Last_Checked__c ) || Contact_Details_Ageing__c > 180, IMAGE( "/resource/ONB_Onboarding_Images/icon_warning.png", "" ) & " Did you review the phone numbers? Click " & HYPERLINK( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01557000003vYLd", "here") & " for the SOP and " & HYPERLINK( "https://countrycode.org/", "here") & " for a list of Country codes.", "Nothing, you're all done!" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays warning and instructional messages to the Users when actions need to be taken on this Contact.
CustomField.label: To Do
